mapper.update: update t_chargePattern set chargeTypeId = #{chargetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chargePattern = #{chargepattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chargeId = #{chargeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payModeId = #{paymodeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, otherCharge = #{othercharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eleModeId = #{elemodeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carparkSurveyInfoId = #{carparksurveyinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where chargePatternId = #{chargepatternid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select chargePatternId, chargeTypeId, chargePattern, chargeId, payModeId, otherCharge, eleModeId, discount, carparkSurveyInfoId from t_chargePattern where chargePatternId = #{chargepatternid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select chargePatternId, chargeTypeId, chargePattern, chargeId, payModeId, otherCharge, eleModeId, discount, carparkSurveyInfoId from t_chargePattern
